title: Telco customer churn
description: A fictional telco company's customer churn based on a variety of possible factors. The churn column indicates whether or not the customer left within the last month.

target.name: Churn
target.description: Whether customer churned within the last month (Yes) or not (No)

features.name: SeniorCitizen
features.description: Indicates if the customer is 65 or older: Yes, No

features.name: Partner
features.description: Whether the customer has a partner or not (Yes, No)

features.name: Dependents
features.description: Indicates if the customer lives with any dependents: Yes, No. Dependents could be children, parents, grandparents, etc.

features.name: tenure
features.description: Indicates the total amount of months that the customer has been with the company by the end of the quarter specified above.

features.name: PhoneService
features.description: Whether the customer has a phone service or not (Yes, No)

features.name: MultipleLines
features.description: Whether the customer has multiple lines or not (Yes, No, No phone service)

features.name: InternetService
features.description: Customers internet service provider (DSL, Fiber optic, No)

features.name: OnlineSecurity
features.description: Whether the customer has online security or not (Yes, No, No internet service)

features.name: OnlineBackup
features.description: Indicates if the customer subscribes to an additional online backup service provided by the company: Yes, No

features.name: DeviceProtection
features.description: Indicates if the customer subscribes to an additional device protection plan for their Internet equipment provided by the company: Yes, No

features.name: TechSupport
features.description: Indicates if the customer subscribes to an additional technical support plan from the company with reduced wait times: Yes, No

features.name: StreamingTV
features.description: Indicates if the customer uses their Internet service to stream television programing from a third party provider: Yes, No. The company does not charge an additional fee for this service.

features.name: StreamingMovies
features.description: Indicates if the customer uses their Internet service to stream movies from a third party provider: Yes, No. The company does not charge an additional fee for this service.

features.name: Contract
features.description: Indicates the customer's current contract type: Month-to-Month, One Year, Two Year.

features.name: PaperlessBilling
features.description: Indicates if the customer has chosen paperless billing: Yes, No

features.name: PaymentMethod
features.description: Indicates how the customer pays their bill: Bank Withdrawal, Credit Card, Mailed Check

features.name: MonthlyCharges
features.description: Indicates the customer's current total monthly charge for all their services from the company.

features.name: TotalCharges
features.description: Indicates the customer's total charges, calculated to the end of the quarter specified above.
